adrFormatAddress: 572 11th Ave, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: It was a relief to find this school. As a first time parent, the idea of leaving my child in the hands of strangers was terrifying. But the teachers at this school really care for their students. I feel at ease when I drop off my daughter. The center is clean and the staff is always happy to help out.

text.text: It was a relief to find this school. As a first time parent, the idea of leaving my child in the hands of strangers was terrifying. But the teachers at this school really care for their students. I feel at ease when I drop off my daughter. The center is clean and the staff is always happy to help out.

originalText.text: My husband and I have been so happy with our experience in the infant classroom, where our daughter has been under the care of her teacher, Ms. Skylah, for about 4.5 months so far. From our first day at TLE as anxious parents, she made every effort to make sure this was a smooth transition and reassuring process, which helped put our minds at ease. We greatly appreciate the attention to detail she gives in ensuring the well-being and development of our daughter. As working parents, knowing that our daughter is with Ms. Skylah gives us great peace of mind - she keeps us informed about daily activities, including how she does with feeding/sleeping and how she’s tracking against milestones, which has helped us to remain connected to her development while we are at work. Our daughter adores Ms. Skylah, which is evident in the daily smiles and excitement when we arrive to see her each morning – this is a great testament to the nurturing environment that Ms. Skylah has created (we can’t thank you enough!).

originalText.text: The Learning Experience at Hell's Kitchen has provided my little one with exceptional early education. The entire staff and curriculum are just amazing. They absolutely care about your child in every way possible. My son has learned and improved so much since the start of his preschool program. Furthermore, the facility itself is brand new and well maintained. Security cameras are present at the location. The building is secure; only authorized parents or guardians with a key fob are able to enter through the main door. They have a sign-in log for all other visitors. My son has two teachers who are very attentive and intelligent. Grandma receives daily briefings from his teachers upon pick-up. They also have an app where photos of your child are uploaded throughout the school day. You will be able to track and follow your child's every activity. I want to give a special thanks and shout-out to both of my son's teachers, Ms.Bazrouk and Ms. Lassalle. You guys are phenomenal. Ms. Bazrouk, you take special care of my son, and he adores you so much. Ms. Lassalle, you are firm, and the children listen to you and learn so much from you. I would also like to thank the Assistant Director, Mark, who goes above and beyond with a smile on his face every day. I love your positive vibes!

originalText.text: The Learning Center of Hells Kitchen has been amazing so far! They are very accommodating to my schedule and needs for my son. They teach the baby sign language so he may communicate and manners, too! He is already tucking his chair back in when leaving the table! Special shout out to Mark for making this a smooth and simple process for me! Also, would love to mention Rosanna from the toddlers classroom! She is always very welcoming and caring toward my son; she treats him like her own. I appreciate that more than anything.

originalText.text: I’m so happy that TLE in Hell’s Kitchen was able to take my daughter in at the last minute. The amazing staff and nurturing environment immediately put Samantha at ease. The clean and spacious facilities provided room for various activities throughout the day, including a large play room to run around in when the class was not able to a walk outside. The teachers care about the children and provide many educational and artistic activities throughout the day. I was thankful for the photos on the app, so I could check in and see how my daughter’s day was going. I recommend this daycare to anyone looking for a safe and loving place for your little one.
